product_name: Innersense Organic BeautyI Create Lift Volumizing Foam
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeSustainable PackagingGive BackInnersense Organic Beauty's I Create Lift Volumizing Foam is a lightweight styling foam to uplift roots and build body. It shapes, defines and smooths wet or dry hair to enhance natural texture and provide light hold to styles.
details: DetailsBenefitsLifts RootsCreates Style MemoryBoosts VolumeKey IngredientsAloe Vera is a versatile and lightweight moisturizer and hair strengthener that leaves strands with a silky textureHoney naturally retains moisture and adds hold and shine to styles. Our honey is sustainably and ethically sourced through local vendorsSugarcane provides light hold, amplifies thickness and improves manageabilityFormulated WithoutPhthalatesEthoxylatesSulfatesSilicones1,4 DioxaneParabensPetro CompoundsPropylene and butylene glycolPEGMEATEAMIAEDTA artificial dyesSynthetic fragrancesItem 2572260How To UseTake a deep breath and become centered. Apply 1-2 pumps to fingers and gently rake or scrunch into hair. Diffuse or air dry to define texture or blow dry smooth.IngredientsWater, Pullulan, Galactoarabinan, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice*, Glycerin, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Gluconolactone, Sodium Benzoate, Calcium Gluconate, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein, Decyl Glucoside, Lauryl Glucoside, Sorbitol, Potassium Sorbate, Cananga Odorata Flower Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Salvia Sclarea (Clary) Oil, Vanillin, Pogostemon Cablin (Patchouli) Oil, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Honey, Sorbic Acid, Citric Acid, Diheptyl Succinate, Capryloyl Glycerin/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Seed Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Cucurbita Pepo (Pumpkin) Seed Oil*, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Macelignan, Tocopherol, LinaloolϮ, LimoneneϮ.ϮA natural component of essential oils*Certified OrganicShipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Take a deep breath and become centered. Apply 1-2 pumps to fingers and gently rake or scrunch into hair. Diffuse or air dry to define texture or blow dry smooth.
ingredients: LimoneneϮ.ϮA natural component of essential oils*Certified Organic

reviews.headline: Loving this foam for my fine curls
reviews.comments: I got this on a whim since my stylist uses it and I actually love it! Its very good if you need a good hair day on day 1 and offers soft, touchable definition. My only con is the pump gets stuck everytime I use it which is kind of annoying.

reviews.headline: Cannot Travel With This
reviews.comments: In truth, this is my holy grail product. But you absolutely cannot travel with this. It will leak everywhere and you will lose 1/2 the bottle or more if you try to bring this. As someone who travels a lot for work, have wasted so much $ trying to bring this with me. Please fix the product design.

reviews.headline: No.  The foam doesn't create the volume I expected.
reviews.comments: The foam doesn't create the lift and volume I expected.  Very expensive for lackluster results.

reviews.headline: Did Not Like It
reviews.comments: It made my hair very stiffed and hard to manage. It did NOT creat a lift for me at all. Will return.

reviews.headline: Has transformed my knotty, fine waves!
reviews.comments: This product has been my new go-to ever since seeing a curl specialist suggested it to me. I have fine, wavy and VERY knotty, color-treated hair. Styling this product with wet hair has been the ultimate fix and I actually look forward to styling my hair now since its way more manageable now than before I found it! I actually get ringlets out of my waves now! 5 stars ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

reviews.headline: My Fellow Brunettes, Beware!
reviews.comments: While there is plenty to like/love about this product: it volumizes, it's mildly scented, it's not sticky, etc. There is one thing that is the be all end all for me to just say no and return it… the white cast/residue it leaves on my brunette hair. Blondes may definitely have more fun with this one, but for me the search continues.

reviews.headline: Works great for my refresh days
reviews.comments: Would give it a five but this bottle leaks. And pump stops working well after half the bottle is gone. Innersense, please work on these issues. I can't even travel with this unless I tape around the inner edges and keep it upright.

reviews.headline: Works great for my refresh days
reviews.comments: Would give it a five but this bottle leaks. And pump stops working well after half the bottle is gone. Innersense, please work on these issues. I can't even travel with this unless I tape around the inner edges and keep it upright.

reviews.headline: New favorite foam!!
reviews.comments: Love this foam more than the defining one! My new favorite!

reviews.headline: Not sold on this
reviews.comments: I have very fine wavy hair.  This does indeed create lift.  But I have used it twice now.  The second time right after a cut and color (no bleaching).  Usually, i can't trust how good a product works right after getting my hair done because my hair always looks great the first wash or two.  But while I have a lot of lift and bounce, I have very little definition and my hair feels dry and is so fuzzy / frizzy.  IT NEVER FEELS LIKE THIS IMMEDIATELY AFTER A HAIR APPOINTMENT, NEVER. Everything else in my routine was the same.  So maybe if you have really oily fine hair, this could be good.  But I just don't trust it long term if it can leave my hair feeling dry so fast after a hair appointment.  I will accept a bit of fuzz for the sake of lift, but not at the sake of no definition.

reviews.headline: Knotty, Wavy hair is manageable!
reviews.comments: I used to use the moroccan oil mousse but it a weird sticky film on my hair, weighed it down and made it knottier.  This is the complete opposite! Perfect amount of hold, gives life and lift. Makes my waves very happy!

reviews.headline: Soft waves with hold
reviews.comments: I adore this product, I used to use Moroccan Mousse but it weighed my wavy hair down and the build up it left behind was awful. When I style my hair with this plus a few other products, I get dream curls that are super soft and hold all day!

reviews.headline: Fullness and softness
reviews.comments: I hate foams and mousses generally as they often leave my hairy sticky, dry, or waxy feeling. I normally use the Color WOW volume foam and thought I'd try this. So far this is my new go-to. Volume without any weird textures to my hair, just softness.

reviews.headline: My curly hair loves this product!
reviews.comments: This product leaves my hair soft and beautiful! The curls are perfect.

reviews.headline: Great for my refresh days
reviews.comments: A little water. A little of this. Scrunch and I'm done.

reviews.headline: Yes I would buy again
reviews.comments: Works great!

reviews.headline: Love, love, love!
reviews.comments: This product may be my new HG! It added volume, definition, and hold while being easy to apply. I applied two pumps all over my damp hair. I'd also like to try it as a single styler, maybe using a couple more pumps. This is one of those products that I don't think I can use incorrectly. Love!!

reviews.headline: Like putting hand sanitizer in your hair
reviews.comments: I wanted to like this product but sadly it didn't work. As soon as I got out of the shower I applied enough for my thick curls, let it air dry and it did create some volume BUT…. My hair felt like straw, it was still frizzy in some spots and my scalp was itchy. As soon as I scrunched it out, I knew I had to wash it again. My poor hair was so dry. What a waste of money.

reviews.headline: magic for curls!!
reviews.comments: the best volume product for curls I have ever tried and I have tried pretty much every single curl brand they have at ulta.  I have bleached 2c/3a fine textured hair with medium to high density, this is super lightweight but still provides enough hold and definition to where I don't use a gel anymore, pairs so well with their shampoo conditioner and the sweet spirit leave in!! my hair will last 4-5 days in between washes with these products, which used to never be the case when I used other products. definitely recommend to follow innersense recommendations on applying products to soaking wet, dripping hair, the products work much better this way!

reviews.headline: Not for my hair
reviews.comments: I don't know, it just didn't work. I heard people rave about this on social media and I know the brand is highly recommended, but it left my hair completely flat and stringy. I thought maybe it would look better on 2nd day hair because I usually get more volume that day, but my curls were lifeless and droopy. I'm sad because I know it's a great brand but it just did nothing for me. My hair is shoulder length, 2b-3a pattern, fine, low density, color-treated.

properties.name: Pros

values.label: For my curly hair, I love the lift I get!

display_values: For my curly hair, I love the lift I get!

faceoff_positive.comments: I have high porosity hair that ranges from type 3c to 4b. It's medium density and my strands are fine to medium. My hair doesn't respond well (looks like a plastic dish sponge - loss of definition/fuzzy, etc) to refresher sprays or wetting after it's been styled. I purchased this along with the hydrate trio because I am trying to master a wash and go. I've used many brands but they've all ended in a wash and stay. I will say that I was blaming my technique for the results, but I've tried different techniques and I'm not sure it's just user error. I will say that my results were slightly better with Innersense than the other brands, but I wouldn't call them successful. I was absolutely impressed with how it made my hair feel ( soft and ease of detangling was the best of all the brands I've tried) but my second day hair looked like a dried sea sponge. I will try to use the products again after I purchase a hair dryer. Air drying may not be best for me to achieve this style and is the last thing I have left to try. I tried this with a leave in from another brand and I did notice my twist out was "fluffier" than usual. It didn't stretch the days between washing any longer but I will continue to use it for wet setting styles.
faceoff_positive.headline: I have high porosity hair

faceoff_negative.comments: Where do I even begin? I'm a new customer and ordered the Hydrating Hairbath, Hydrating Cream Conditoner, I Create Quiet Calm Curl Control and Volumizing Foam. I have naturally tight curly hair and was excited to give these a try after reading all the rave reviews, but after my first wash I was devastated. My hair was like STRAW. Two more washes later and my hair was even drier, more lifeless, and completely devoid of any curl definition. When I emailed Customer Service they said I shouldn't be using the Hydrating Collection but should be using the Color Collection instead. So let me get this right. I have naturally tight curly hair (never had straight hair in my life) and somehow I should know to NOT buy the products for curly hair? Huh? Since I apparently bought the wrong stuff, I then had to spend $20+ mailing everything back (UGH) and dished out another $70+ on new products. (Would it have killed you guys to send me a prepaid shipping label and simply deducted $5-$7 from my refund like every other retailer?) Then I come to find out that the 2.37 oz Volumizing Foam that I returned wasn't eligible because it's considered travel sized?! Where on the website does it say that it's travel sized? I get it. *Technically* it's below the 3oz TSA allowance, but technically so is the 1 oz Harmonic Healing Oil, which you accepted. And I know you guys have an entire TRAVEL trio line because they're LABELED AS TRAVEL KITS. This was not labeled as such. I was willing to forgive the destruction of my hair (which is still recovering) and annoyingly excessive return shipping costs, but 3 strikes and you're out, Innersense. You literally just lost a customer over $12 because your overall customer experience stinks.
faceoff_negative.headline: Buyer Beware
